title: 01/05/22 DPS Hour 2 Nick Wright
itunes:title: 01/05/22 DPS Hour 2 Nick Wright
description:
Nick Wright joins The Dan Patrick Show, and he says that MVP voters have the right to use non-football arguments when deciding who to vote for. Plus, Nick details exactly why Jim Harbaugh could find his way back to the NFL next season.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
